sentence.Network_en: The event itself may be seen as either ex nihilo or order from preexisting chaos.
sentence.Network_cn: 事件本身可以被看作要么不可得的虚无要么来自现有混沌的法则.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...变化——预测两秒后会发生的状况，全神贯注于刀刃般的虚无（nihilo），以等同于冥想状态的无我目光，统合探测情报进行判断。
Creatio exnihilo, 从无到有的创造61.

list.abs: ...犹之乎本来一点东西没有，决不能凭空忽然发现东西，“无中不能生有”(ex nihilo nihil fit)一语可代表巴氏思想。
由于英译本将无中生有（ex nihilo）及三位一体等基督教概念加进旧约圣经中，所以在比较圣经与其他古代近东文献时一般难以显示二 …
这就是从无(ex nihilo)的意思。同样，由生命爆出思想亦是从无的。
社会契约论，作为一项人的“无”中生有的创世论（Creation ex nihilo），其与犹太的创世论和约法传统之间的深刻渊源，我们最早可以 …
的路径，以及神从无中创造（creation ex nihilo）世界的方式。卡巴拉学者使用生命之树作为创世的示意图，从而将创世这个概念发展 …

auth_sentence.content: However, ex nihilo comes the Big Bang or whatever.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, ex nihilo comes the Big Bang or whatever.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, ex nihilo comes the Big Bang or whatever.

auth_sentence.content: Creationism claims that whatever fossils are present could have been placed by the creator when creating humans ex nihilo.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Creationism claims that whatever fossils are present could have been placed by the creator when creating humans ex nihilo.

auth_sentence.content: However much of a maverick he may have been, these dreams did not pop into his head ex nihilo.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: However much of a maverick he may have been, these dreams did not pop into his head ex nihilo.
